ygData.subject: Missed Notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I am either a Black Helicopter watching Psycho, or another Bard that can t play songs as reliable as before.  Anyway, this was the final nail in my frustration
ygData.messageBody:
I am either a Black Helicopter watching Psycho, or another Bard that can't
play songs as reliable as before. Anyway, this was the final nail in my
frustration coffin, and so I have retired my 33rd Level Bard, Narcissus of
Povar. Hopefully this retirement will be temporary (it is has lasted only a
week or so, so far). Meanwhile I am exploring other classes and *reducing*
my dependence on grouping (more or less limiting my group size to my wife
and I).
